Item Description 2008 Gibson Les Paul Standard Traditional Plus Electric Guitar in very good condition with a few light dings on the front and back. Beautiful Desert Burst Flame Top with Antique pickguard and binding. The guitar has a nice action and the rounded 50's profile neck has a great feel. The frets are very good condition with little to no playwear. The '57 Classic and Classic Plus pickups have a great tone with good output. Looks, plays and sounds great. Includes hard shell case. Made in the USA. Serial Number: 012880403 Weight: 9 lbs 3 oz. The Gibson Les Paul Standard Traditional Plus electric guitar has all the traditional features you expect from a Les Paul: mahogany body and set neck, figured maple top, and a pair of Gibson's awesome '57 Classic humbucker pickups. The Plus on this guitar is the gorgeous, figured maple top—just the right touch on this iconic rock machine. One not-so-traditional improvement—the neck has been dressed by Gibson's Plek machine, a computer-controlled robot that analyzes the neck, files the frets, and cuts the slots on the nut to a hundredth of a millimeter accuracy for optimal action and intonation without string buzzing.
